title: React for Humans: Fundamentals with Emotional Clarity
description: Learn React from scratch with examples that teach, not confuse. Perfect for building accessible, understandable components.

title: TypeScript Without Fear: Strong Typing for Frontend Devs
description: Master TypeScript with practical examples that help you write modular, scalable, and defensible code.

title: Cloud Fundamentals with Azure: Your First Step Toward AI
description: Explore key cloud concepts using Azure. Ideal for frontend developers looking to integrate AI and scale their projects.

title: Accessible UI Design: Components That Respect and Teach
description: Build interfaces that not only work but honor user diversity. Includes ARIA practices and emotionally intelligent validation.

title: Advanced React for Interviews: Patterns You Can Defend
description: Practice context/reducer, Redux Toolkit, and separation of concerns. Each module includes interview-style questions and technical defenses.
